HEISTMUSIC.Settings.Playlist.Title: Playlist of music for each phase
HEISTMUSIC.Settings.UseCreationForProgre: Music from the "Creation" phase for the "Progression" phase
There is no official music for the "Progression" phase. The module will then use the one for the "Agent creation" phase.
